top_comments.comment: Can someone tell her that Trump hasn’t been president in almost a year?

It’s so nice having a president that no longer embarrasses the United States on the world stage. I cannot believe how many people want Trump, who is a complete and utter moron, back in office. He made us look weak and foolish.
Adding to my previous comment: don’t smile Durham when this boomerang comes back at you because the backlash will knock your teeth out!

Vicarius Filii Dei 
In Roman numeral numbers it adds up to 666
(Latin: Vicar or Representative of the Son of God) is a phrase first used in the forged medieval Donation of Constantine to refer to Saint Peter, who is regarded as the first Pope by the Catholic Church.
